video.title: Gossip Girl
video.synopsis: Kristen Bell provides the voice of an anonymous blogger who narrates the action in this hit series set in an exclusive New York City boarding school.

episodes.synopsis: The privileged prep school teens on Manhattan's Upper East Side learn that Serena van der Woodsen is back.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the scandalous Kiss on the Lips party, Serena receives an ice-cold reception from her best friend, Blair.
episodes.title: The Wild Brunch

episodes.synopsis: Blair uncovers scandalous information about Serena that may not remain a secret much longer.
episodes.title: Poison Ivy

episodes.synopsis: Blair is thrilled when her mother chooses her to be the new face of her clothing line.
episodes.title: Bad News Blair

episodes.synopsis: Dan makes elaborate plans to impress Serena on their first official date.
episodes.title: Dare Devil

episodes.synopsis: Dan is torn between two girls when his childhood friend Vanessa returns home and declares her feelings for him.
episodes.title: The Handmaiden's Tale

episodes.synopsis: Serena and Dan finally acknowledge that they are crazy about each other, despite their polar-opposite worlds.
episodes.title: Victor, Victrola

episodes.synopsis: Blair puts on a happy face for her 17th birthday party and attempts to hide the truth from her friends.
episodes.title: Seventeen Candles

episodes.synopsis: When Dan finds out that Serena and her family are celebrating Thanksgiving alone, he naively invites them to spend the holiday with his family.
episodes.title: Blair Waldorf Must Pie!

episodes.synopsis: Serena has absolutely no intention of attending the upcoming Debutante Ball, until her grandmother, CeCe, announces that Serena must attend.
episodes.title: Hi, Society

episodes.synopsis: When Blair's father comes home for the holidays with an unexpected guest -- his boyfriend -- Blair finds it difficult to hide her disappointment.
episodes.title: Roman Holiday

episodes.synopsis: The gang breaks into the school swimming pool for an impromptu night of fun.
episodes.title: School Lies

episodes.synopsis: Gossip Girl takes pleasure in reporting that Serena van der Woodsen has been spotted buying a pregnancy test, and word spreads like wildfire.
episodes.title: A Thin Line Between Chuck and Nate

episodes.synopsis: Blair returns to school after losing Queen Bee status; Serena's not fond of living with her future stepbrother, Chuck.
episodes.title: The Blair Bitch Project

episodes.synopsis: Serena's world is turned upside down when her former partner in crime, Georgina Sparks, returns to Manhattan to stir up trouble.
episodes.title: Desperately Seeking Serena

episodes.synopsis: Blair and Jenny escalate their "popularity war" by spreading scandalous rumors about each other through Gossip Girl.
episodes.title: All About My Brother

episodes.synopsis: Georgina reveals the true reason that Serena fled Manhattan for boarding school, and Serena quickly falls back into her old habits.
episodes.title: Woman on the Verge

episodes.synopsis: With Serena's reputation on the line, Blair takes matters into her own hands to deal with manipulative Georgina.
episodes.title: Much 'I Do' About Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Gossip Girl heads to the Hamptons as summer comes to a close. Serena and Nate fake a relationship as a cover for Nate's affair with a married woman.
episodes.title: Summer, Kind of Wonderful

episodes.synopsis: Blair is thrilled to be dating royalty, but a scheming Chuck has other plans for her. Serena and Dan agree to keep their recent hookups a secret.
episodes.title: Never Been Marcused

episodes.synopsis: Serena and Dan must deal with their problems while trapped in an elevator. Blair and Chuck question the lack of passion in their relationships.
episodes.title: The Dark Night

episodes.synopsis: When Serena notices Dan's been cozying up to the new girl in school, ever-loyal Blair and her minions decide to sabotage Amanda's budding new romance.
episodes.title: The Ex-Files

episodes.synopsis: Blair sabotages her mother's show at Fashion Week. Dan starts hanging out with Chuck, and learns that a walk on the dark side always has risks.
episodes.title: The Serena Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: After a fight, Serena wants to get even with Blair -- who dreams of attending Yale -- and accepts an invitation to visit. Chuck is kidnapped.
episodes.title: New Haven Can Wait

episodes.synopsis: Blair seeks revenge by enticing Chuck to seduce Vanessa. Serena rebels at a party of Lily's. Dan and Jenny find out a secret Nate has been hiding.
episodes.title: Chuck In Real Life

episodes.synopsis: Jenny befriends a model, and is encouraged to explore her wild side. Serena is attracted to an artist, Aaron Rose.
episodes.title: Pret-a-Poor-J

episodes.synopsis: Serena realizes Aaron has kept a secret from her. Jenny and Agnes plan a guerilla fashion show. Blair baby-sits the daughter of a Yale donor.
episodes.title: There Might be Blood

episodes.synopsis: Dan tries to get close to Bart Bass to possibly write an exposé, but things get heated when Chuck finds out.
episodes.title: Bonfire of the Vanity

episodes.synopsis: Blair's favorite Thanksgiving traditions are ruined by her mother's new boyfriend. Serena doesn't tell Aaron about her past -- but Dan does.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Archibalds

episodes.synopsis: At the annual Snowflake Ball, Blair and Chuck bet they can find ideal dates for each other. Aaron's ex-girlfriend shows interest in Dan.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Lie

episodes.synopsis: A sudden and tragic event impacts the lives of everyone on the Upper East Side, especially Chuck and the van der Woodsens.
episodes.title: O Brother, Where Bart Thou?

episodes.synopsis: Chuck's uncle, Jack Bass, arrives on the scene. Meanwhile, Jenny returns to school and takes on the mean girls.
episodes.title: In the Realm of the Basses

episodes.synopsis: Bart's will is read and everyone learns the fate of the Bass empire. Plus, Dan discovers the secret between Rufus and Lily.
episodes.title: Gone with the Will

episodes.synopsis: Which students will be accepted to Yale University? Chuck pairs up with an unlikely ally in his war with Jack over Bass Industries.
episodes.title: You've Got Yale!

episodes.synopsis: Blair comes up with a plan to get revenge on her teacher. Chuck wakes up in a hotel and tries to piece together what happened the night before.
episodes.title: Carrnal Knowledge

episodes.synopsis: The seniors put on a production of "The Age of Innocence." Chuck enlists help from an unlikely source -- his nemesis, Carter Baizen.
episodes.title: The Age of Dissonance

episodes.synopsis: Devastated by the recent plot twist in her life, Blair turns her back on her predictable existence in favor of a wilder lifestyle.
episodes.title: The Grandfather

episodes.synopsis: Serena throws Jenny a party for her 16th birthday, but things get out of control when Poppy Lifton turns the small gathering into a huge social event.
episodes.title: Remains of the J

episodes.synopsis: Serena returns from her trip to Spain with Poppy and Gabriel. Blair makes a secret deal with Nate's grandfather. Dan gets a job.
episodes.title: Seder Anything

episodes.synopsis: Georgina returns. Chuck and Nate are at a crossroads in their friendship -- a result of their mutual interest in Blair.
episodes.title: Southern Gentlemen Prefer Blondes

episodes.synopsis: Blair pressures Georgina to help her in a scheme. Nate and Chuck's rivalry over Blair comes to a head. Lily hatches a secret plan to help Rufus.
episodes.title: The Wrath of Con

episodes.synopsis: To prove her independence, Serena refuses to leave jail with her mother or her grandmother. Rufus is furious with Lily for having Serena arrested.
episodes.title: Valley Girls

episodes.synopsis: In a season finale rife with cliffhangers, Gossip Girl livens things up at graduation by sending out a shocking email blast during the ceremony.
episodes.title: The Goodbye Gossip Girl

episodes.synopsis: Blair and Chuck adjust to their new status as a couple. Serena returns from Europe with many secrets and a complicated relationship with Carter.
episodes.title: Reversals of Fortune

episodes.synopsis: Blair begins NYU, determined to keep her Queen Bee status, but Georgina has other ideas. Serena recruits Carter to get even with Chuck.
episodes.title: The Freshmen

episodes.synopsis: It's Blair versus Chuck as they both set their sights on a particular item up for bid at Sotheby's. Plus, Georgina takes an interest in Dan.
episodes.title: The Lost Boy

episodes.synopsis: It's Jenny's first day as Queen Bee. Plus, a famous actress, Olivia Burke, is assigned as Vanessa's roommate.
episodes.title: Dan de Fleurette

episodes.synopsis: Will Lily and Rufus go through with their planned nuptials? Plus, Dan and Vanessa are pulled into one of Georgina's schemes. Sonic Youth performs.
episodes.title: Rufus Getting Married

episodes.synopsis: Dan invites Olivia to meet Rufus and Lily, which leads to all sorts of problems for the new couple. Serena and Nate team up to help Carter Baizen.
episodes.title: Enough About Eve

episodes.synopsis: Serena helps Chuck open his club, but Blair feels left out. Dan is unnerved watching one of Olivia's sex scenes with a former co-star.
episodes.title: How to Succeed in Bassness

episodes.synopsis: Olivia says something she regrets during an appearance on a talk show with host Jimmy Fallon and tries to keep Dan from finding out.
episodes.title: The Grandfather: Part ll

episodes.synopsis: Jenny sets her sights on landing the hottest escort for Cotillion. Dan is upset when Olivia contemplates leaving school. Plastiscine performs.
episodes.title: They Shoot Humphreys, Don't They?

episodes.synopsis: Dan and Olivia sign up to write and star in a school play, based on an idea by Blair and directed by Vanessa. Lady Gaga performs.
episodes.title: The Last Days of Disco Stick

episodes.synopsis: How about an extra serving of holiday drama? Serena is put in an awkward position when Lily invites Tripp and Maureen to join them for dinner.
episodes.title: The Treasure of Serena Madre

episodes.synopsis: Chuck wrestles with a past issue and a serious car accident rocks the Upper East Side. Dan and Vanessa try to navigate their complicated friendship.
episodes.title: The Debarted

episodes.synopsis: Chuck tracks the woman he saw at his father's grave. Jenny agrees to help Damien. Nate and Serena get friendly.
episodes.title: The Hurt Locket

episodes.synopsis: Rufus and Lily are suspicious of Jenny's relationship with Damien. Chuck learns more about the mysterious woman.
episodes.title: The Lady Vanished

episodes.synopsis: Jenny contemplates her relationship with Damien. Dan and Vanessa try to define the different "zones" of their relationship.
episodes.title: The Sixteen Year Old Virgin

episodes.synopsis: Rufus volunteers Jenny to help with Eleanor's fashion show, but things take a bad turn when Jenny learns Agnes is one of the models.
episodes.title: The Empire Strikes Jack

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Blair are faced with a difficult decision as a couple. Serena plans a birthday party for Nate, but Jenny tries to sabotage Serena's efforts.
episodes.title: Inglorius Bassterds

episodes.synopsis: Chuck offers to throw a wedding for a very pregnant Dorota. Serena doesn't tell Nate she is secretly meeting up with Carter Baizen.
episodes.title: The Unblairable Lightness of Being

episodes.synopsis: When Lily's ex-husband shows up unexpectedly, Serena gets the reunion with her father she has so desperately wanted -- or does she?
episodes.title: Dr. Estrangeloved

episodes.synopsis: Will's return to the Upper East Side continues to stir up problems for Serena, Lily and Will's long-standing rival, Rufus.
episodes.title: It's a Dad, Dad, Dad, Dad World

episodes.synopsis: When things get tense between Rufus and Will, Serena chooses to stand behind her father, leaving Rufus to feel like an outsider within his own family.
episodes.title: Ex-Husbands and Wives

episodes.synopsis: Blair decides whether or not she'll meet Chuck at the top of the Empire State Building. A Gossip Girl bomb involving Dan explodes. Georgina returns.
episodes.title: Last Tango, Then Paris

episodes.synopsis: As season four kicks off in Paris, Blair spots a mysterious Chuck Bass in the City of Lights... with a beautiful new woman.
episodes.title: Belles de Jour

episodes.synopsis: Blair is pursued by a handsome young man she suspects is part of Monaco's royal family. Chuck adjusts to Paris with a mysterious new woman.
episodes.title: Double Identity

episodes.synopsis: It's back to the Upper East Side. Blair has her first day at Columbia University and Serena suspects Juliet is intentionally sabotaging Serena's life.
episodes.title: The Undergraduates

episodes.synopsis: Nate suspects that Juliet is keeping a secret from him and decides to confront her. Blair schemes to undermine Chuck's newfound happiness.
episodes.title: Touch of Eva

episodes.synopsis: A Gossip Girl blast starts a damaging rumor about Serena. Blair decides to take a class with a powerful businesswoman, but her plans are thwarted.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Columbia

episodes.synopsis: Although Blair made it clear that Jenny was not welcome in Manhattan after what happened with Chuck, Jenny is tempted by the chance to meet Tim Gunn.
episodes.title: Easy J

episodes.synopsis: Blair is caught off-guard by a guest at her birthday party. Having had enough of Chuck and Blair's games, Serena and Nate plan an intervention.
episodes.title: War at the Roses

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Blair decide it's in both of their best interests to put the past behind them and end their vindictive games. Nate confronts Juliet.
episodes.title: Juliet Doesn't Live Here Anymore

episodes.synopsis: Chuck throws a "Saints and Sinners" masquerade party. Blair sets her sights on becoming the new face of Anne Archibald's foundation for girls.
episodes.title: The Witches of Bushwick

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Serena, Blair, Dan, Jenny and Eric are faced with a crisis when a member of one of their families is hospitalized.
episodes.title: Gaslit

episodes.synopsis: Blair and Dan join forces to track down Juliet, who is MIA. Chuck suspects Lily isn't telling him the truth.
episodes.title: The Townie

episodes.synopsis: Russell Thorpe, a former associate of Chuck's father, and his daughter, Raina, return to Manhattan with some unfinished business.
episodes.title: The Kids Are Not All Right

episodes.synopsis: It's Blair versus Dan when both land an internship at W magazine. Chuck may have met his match with Russell Thorpe and his daughter back in town.
episodes.title: Damien Darko

episodes.synopsis: Blair enlists Nate's help to win over her high-strung boss at W magazine. Damien stirs up more drama.
episodes.title: Panic Roommate

episodes.synopsis: Chuck makes one last-ditch effort to save Bass Industries. Blair is given a challenging assignment, and Serena struggles with her feelings for Ben.
episodes.title: It-Girl Happened One Night

episodes.synopsis: At Eric's 18th-birthday celebration, there is plenty of drama to go around. Serena is forced to choose between her family and Ben.
episodes.title: While You Weren't Sleeping

episodes.synopsis: Ben's mother comes to town, forcing issues to the surface between Ben and Serena.
episodes.title: Empire of the Son

episodes.synopsis: Lily's family offers support and takes part in a Taschen photo shoot on "modern royalty."
episodes.title: The Kids Stay in the Picture

episodes.synopsis: Serena enlists Charlie to go undercover to determine why Dan and Blair are spending so much time together. Raina decides to search for her mother.
episodes.title: Petty in Pink

episodes.synopsis: Blair's dreams appear to be coming true, but Serena may jeopardize it all. Nate is torn between his relationship with Raina and loyalty to Chuck.
episodes.title: The Princesses and the Frog

episodes.synopsis: En route to "happily ever after," Blair finds herself torn between the men in her life. Jack Bass returns to the Upper East Side.
episodes.title: Shattered Bass

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Georgina Sparks returns, Airborne Toxic Event perform and Cecily Von Ziegesar appears -- plus, a few very juicy cliffhangers.
episodes.title: The Wrong Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Nate visit Serena in Los Angeles and attend a glamorous Hollywood Hills party where Nate meets a sexy older woman.
episodes.title: Yes, Then Zero

episodes.synopsis: Nate reconnects unexpectedly with Diana, who offers him an exciting opportunity. Blair's future sister-in-law, Beatrice, arrives from Monaco.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Feast

episodes.synopsis: At Diana's request, Nate must decide whether to cross moral lines. Chuck helps Dan come to terms with his fate.
episodes.title: The Jewel of Denial

episodes.synopsis: Dan decides to gather his friends and family to reveal the truth about his book in the hope that they will support him at his book party.
episodes.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Dan

episodes.synopsis: Serena must choose between her new job and her relationship with Dan. Diana expects Nate to help out when an unexpected surprise delays her launch.
episodes.title: The Fasting and the Furious

episodes.synopsis: Blair makes her former minions and Charlie compete for the coveted bridesmaid spots in her upcoming wedding. Nate uses Charlie to make Diana jealous.
episodes.title: I Am Number Nine

episodes.synopsis: Attending a performance the provocative theater experience "Sleep No More" means masks, anonymity and some surprising romantic twists. But for whom?
episodes.title: The Big Sleep No More

episodes.synopsis: Serena plans a dream bridal shower for Blair, but Chuck and Dan aren't invited. Nate and Serena make a discovery in Diana's war against Gossip Girl.
episodes.title: All the Pretty Sources

episodes.synopsis: Lily, Charlie and Serena eagerly anticipate the Studio 54 party thrown in CeCe's honor. Nate takes on a new role at the Spectator.
episodes.title: Rhodes to Perdition

episodes.synopsis: Lily officially introduces Charlie to New York society with a party. Meanwhile, Charlie's ex-boyfriend, Max, throws a wrench into her future plans.
episodes.title: Riding in Town Cars With Boys

episodes.synopsis: Through a series of emotional flashbacks, Blair reveals to Serena what really happened in the aftermath of her tragic car accident with Chuck.
episodes.title: The End of the Affair?

episodes.synopsis: Blair prepares for her bachelorette party. Nate teams with a surprising ally to gather evidence about Chuck and Blair's car accident.
episodes.title: Father and the Bride

episodes.synopsis: As Blair is about to marry Prince Louis, the return of Georgina Sparks might make the royal affair a royal disaster.
episodes.title: G.G

episodes.synopsis: Blair struggles to decide about her future and Serena takes the blame for an incident with Gossip Girl in order to protect someone she loves.
episodes.title: The Backup Dan

episodes.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day, and Georgina, intent on stirring up drama, decides to crash Nate's Valentine's Day party.
episodes.title: Crazy, Cupid, Love

episodes.synopsis: Dan's book is showcased by comedy troupe Upright Citizen's Brigade, and Blair tries to prove Serena's suspicions wrong.
episodes.title: Cross Rhodes

episodes.synopsis: Chuck and Georgina partner up in a scheme, with an unpredictable outcome. A family crisis brings William van der Woodsen to town.
episodes.title: The Princess Dowry

episodes.synopsis: Chuck invites Jack to town; Blair and Dan attempt to consummate their new relationship; and Ivy finds an unlikely ally in William.
episodes.title: Con Heir

episodes.synopsis: Serena tries to make a reluctant Lola the next It Girl of the Upper East Side, starting with modeling at a Kiki de Montparnasse show.
episodes.title: It Girl, Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate being a couple, Blair and Dan host a glamorous British-themed Salon. Serena and Diana face off.
episodes.title: Salon of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Lily has a family gathering with William, Carol and Lola. Nate digs into Diana's past. Blair's status worries her.
episodes.title: Despicable B

episodes.synopsis: Chuck, Nate, Blair, Serena and Lola team up to uncover what they think is an explosive secret between Diana and Jack.
episodes.title: Raiders of the Lost Art

episodes.synopsis: Serena poses as Blair at an important meeting. Ivy and Lola team up to help Chuck. Nate makes a decision about the future and Diana.
episodes.title: The Fugitives

episodes.synopsis: When Gossip Girl goes after Blair, Serena admits she may have played a role in Blair's latest nightmare. Plus, will Blair choose Chuck or Dan?
episodes.title: The Return of the Ring

episodes.synopsis: In the sixth season premiere, Serena has gone missing and Chuck and Blair make a promise to each other about their relationship.
episodes.title: Gone Maybe Gone

episodes.synopsis: Serena hosts a gala, Blair prepares to debut a new fashion line and Dan decides if he's willing to sacrifice his integrity to get his work published.
episodes.title: High Infidelity

episodes.synopsis: Blair relies on help from an unlikely source to make her first Waldorf Designs fashion show a success, but scheming causes a scandal on the runway.
episodes.title: Dirty Rotten Scandals

episodes.synopsis: Chuck's investigation into his father's dealings leads to an unlikely event with Manhattan's elite. Serena and Steven reveal their romantic histories.
episodes.title: Portrait of a Lady Alexander

episodes.synopsis: Eleanor gives Blair an ultimatum, Serena worries about Steven's attitude toward her and Dan publishes another article.
episodes.title: Monstrous Ball

episodes.synopsis: With Ivy's help, Chuck discovers there is evidence incriminating his father and enlists Nate to help retrieve it. Serena volunteers to help Dan.
episodes.title: Where the Vile Things Are

episodes.synopsis: Serena and Dan decide to make amends with those they have wronged. Chuck is close to getting the evidence he needs against his father.
episodes.title: Save the Last Chance

episodes.synopsis: What's Thanksgiving without a side of drama? Serena and Dan throw their first Thanksgiving together, but everyone seems to have their own agenda.
episodes.title: It's Really Complicated

episodes.synopsis: After a run-in with Bart, Blair is concerned for Chuck's safety and devises a plan with Serena, Georgina and Sage.
episodes.title: The Revengers

episodes.synopsis: In a fashionable farewell to remember, the Upper East Siders join forces for one last soiree, and the identity of Gossip Girl is finally revealed.
episodes.title: New York, I Love You, XOXO
